name: Google Apps Meu Rancho
description:
A corporate custom style for Google Apps and a special style for Gmail.
I'll make available options for custom color branding.

user.name: Adriano Monecchi
user.about:
I'm a 26 year designer from Brazil. All styles/scripts I publish are originally created for my personal use. I invite you to test them and if you like please consider donating any amount to support the styles updates.
Comments in the forum for requests or doubts are welcome and so are your "likes" & "shares". 

Thanks for stopping by :)

Enjoy!
